basics.name: Carlos Antonio Lázaro Mauricio
basics.label: +5 years of experience. Fullstack Web Developer.
basics.summary: +5 years of experience as a Software Developer. I started my career in the BPM world, but participating in various projects allowed me to discover and become passionate about web development, an area in which I have specialized. I focus on UX/UI, following standards, conventions, and best practices. Although I excel in web development, I am always open and continuously learning, seeking to improve and update my skills. I am a technology enthusiast, a lover of programming, and efficient methodologies.

work.name: WEDOX Peru
work.summary: Responsible for developing the User Interfaces and User Experience of the BUPLAT platform. Implemented best practices, readability, and code optimization based on the framework documentation on which the platform is based. Created reusable and functional components (custom controls).
highlights: Received and analyzed requirements, proposing alternatives when necessary to ensure the best possible solution.

work.name: WES IT
work.summary: BPM Developer for an international consumer goods client, implementing advanced solutions using Bizagi Studio, SQL Server, and various web technologies to overcome Bizagi limitations. I was part of the team responsible for developing expressions for process automation and optimized workflow, managing supplier master data and data configuration, as well as the massive process data update. We also developed a configurable processes framework that covered configuration management, variants, routes, authorizations, and configuration transport. This resulted in significant improvements in operational efficiency, data accuracy, and business process flexibility, achieving rapid adaptation to changing business needs.

work.name: iDo Consulting Company SAC
work.summary: Developer of various national and international projects using a wide stack of technologies and tools. Focused on both frontend and backend implementations, as well as working closely with the design team to ensure an intuitive and efficient user experience.

projects.name: Shopi
projects.description: Ecommerce with basic features such as shopping cart, product filtering and pagination, detailed product view, as well as route handling and state management with Context API.
